text: ( Source : The Irvine Company LLC ) 10/15 / 2015 Irvine Company is first major real estate company in the world to plan portfolio-wide use of energy storage NEWPORT BEACH and SAN FRANCISCO, Calif. (Oct. 12, 2015) - The Irvine Company announced
